pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Small Herbivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() False $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Peaceful $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Forests $(br2)$(l)Gender Dimorphism:$() $(br) N/A
Fairies are small, insect-like, flying creatures that hover around trees and forests. They glow in the dark, come in multiple colors, and drop Fairy Dust when killed.
